metadata.title: CVE-2015-7507 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: libnsbmp.c in Libnsbmp 0.1.2 allows context-dependent attackers to cause adenial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted color table to the (1)bmp_decode_rgb or (2) bmp_decode_rle function.

criterions.comment: libnsgif: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
